quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Goonies
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, jail, county. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This slasher movie, released in 1976, contains the following quote: I heard everyone leave. Its all over, huh? Well, you die and they put you in the ground. Such a shame. Such a pretty girl too. Too bad she was the one to end up in the box.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alice, Sweet Alice

questions.question: After they saved their lives The Goonies are seen walking on what beach?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Goat Rock State Beach, CA.

questions.question: What was the address of the museum in which Mickeys dad works in the movie The Goonies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 441 -8th Street

questions.question: In what 1987 horror movie were these lines delivered: I thought Id gone to the limits. I hadnt. The Cenobites gave me an experience beyond limits... pain and pleasure, indivisible.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hellraiser

questions.question: In what 1988 horror movie does the following conversation occur:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Childs Play

questions.question: What 1999 horror movie is this quote from: We walked for 15 hours today, we ended up in the same place! Theres no one here to help you, THATS your motivation! THATS YOUR MOTIVATION!?

options.text: I Know What You Did Last Summer

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Blair Witch Project

questions.question: The movie The Goonies grossed $150,415,432 in 1985?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What 1982 movie contains the following exchange:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Creepshow

questions.question: The Restaurant / lounge in The Goonies was only constructed for the movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is the address of the Goonies House?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 368 -38th Street

questions.question: What 2004 movie is the following quote from: Theres a slow-acting poison coursing through your system, which only I have the antidote for. Will you murder a mother and her child to save yourself? Listen carefully, if you will. There are rules.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Saw

questions.question: What is the name of the county jail seen in the opening credits of the movie The Goonies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Clatsop County Jail

questions.question: The store in the movie The Goonies is located at what intersection?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 37th Street and Highway 30

questions.question: What 2005 movie is this quote from: Hey, towns looking real good. We almost finished what ma started. Those two are good, theyll fit perfectly. What I tell, huh? Aint your work more real now? Ma would be proud, yeah shed be real proud.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: House of Wax

questions.question: What 1994 movie is this quote from: My them. Every paranoid schizophrenic has one; a them, a they, an it. And you want to hear about my them, dont you??
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In the Mouth of Madness

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Kennedy

questions.question: Was James Coburn in the movie The Magnificent Seven?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Who plays Chris Adams in the third sequel to The Magnificent Seven, The Magnificent Seven Ride?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lee Van Cleef

questions.question: Paul W.S. Anderson wrote, produced and directed all 3 Resident Evil movies.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the movie The Magnificent Seven Robert Vaughn played Harry Luck.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Who played the character of Jill Valentine in Resident Evil: Apocalypse?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sienna Guillory

questions.question: Who played the Mexican bandito, Calvera in the film The Magnificent Seven?

questions.question: What year was the movie Return of the Magnificent Seven released?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1966

questions.question: Ashanti plays Betty in Resident Evil: Extinction.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who directed Return of the Magnificent Seven, the first sequel to The Magnificent Seven?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Burt Kennedy

questions.question: Was Bernardo OReilly, played by Charles Bronson, one of the Banditos in The Magnificent Seven?

questions.question: In Resident Evil: Apocalypse the only returning actors from the first movie were Mila Jovovich and Mike Epps.

questions.question: What are the names of seven Goonies in the movie The Goonies?

options.text: Brad, Mikey, Mouth, Data, Andy, Stef, Chunk
Mouth, Data, Sadi, Andy, Chunk, Brad, Mikey
Mikey, Mouth, Data, Andy, Chunk, Sandy, Brad
Data, Chunk, Stef, Mouth, Andy, Brand, Mikey

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Data, Chunk, Stef, Mouth, Andy, Brand, Mikey

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Monty Python and Holy Grail
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, people, awards. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The Black Knight from the movie Monty Python and the Holy Grail moves for no man! He also apparently dies for no man. When King Arthur leaves him, what does he cry out?

options.text: Its just a flesh wound. Ive had worse. Have at you!
Alright, well call it a draw.
The black knight always triumphs! Have at you!
Come back here, you yellow bastards, and take whats coming to you! Ill bite yer legs off!

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Come back here, you yellow bastards, and take whats coming to you! Ill bite yer legs off!

questions.question: This 1992 movie received the Oscar for Best Picture at the 65th Academy Awards in 1993?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Unforgiven

questions.question: Where does King Arthur imply that he found the coconuts in the film Monty Python and the Holy Grail?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mercea

questions.question: What 1991 movie was the winner of the Academy Award for Best Picture at the 64th Academy Awards in 1992?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Silence of the Lambs

questions.question: It seems these days that most people are aware that if you weigh the same as a duck, youre (obviously) made of wood, and therefore a witch. However, in Monty Python and the Holy Grail, according to this logic, which of these items do the peasants believe could ALSO determine that you are a witch, if you weighed the same as it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cider

questions.question: Why was the peasant in Scene two (Bring out yer dead!) of Monty Python and the Holy Grail able to discern that Arthur was a king?

options.text: Es got a band o cohorts!
Es got all that fancy armour on im.
E looks right snooty, to me.
E doesnt got shit all over im.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: E doesnt got shit all over im.

questions.question: The word zombie is never used in any of the Resident Evil movies.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of the following do they  NOT eat a lot in Camelot according to the movie Monty Python and the Holy Grail?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lamb

questions.question: A teaser commercial was released as a trailer for Resident Evil: Apocalypse. It was marketed as a skin care product to make you look younger. What was the name of the product?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Regenerate

questions.question: In the movie Monty Python and the Holy Grail, the word it, which is the word the Knights of Ni cannot stand to hear, is actually spoken on occasion (in front of them) without them making a big deal of it.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What 1993 film was honored with the Academy Award for Best Picture at the 66th Academy Awards ceremony in 1994?

options.text: In the Name of the Father

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Schindlers List

questions.question: Is it just a myth that the fireplace in the background, during the Black Knight scene of Monty Python and the Holy Grail, goes out and comes on as the camera shots change?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: What powers do we know for sure that Tim from Monty Python and the Holy Grail possesses?

options.text: The power to curdle milk from fifty farthings away
The power to conjure fire and teleport
The power to summon wind and rain
The power to hypnotise small, furry creatures, and speak with animals

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The power to conjure fire and teleport

questions.question: At the 63rd Academy Awards ceremony in 1991, this 1990 movie received the Academy Award for Best Picture.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dances with Wolves

questions.question: Which list contains only the primary Monty Python cast members?

options.text: Michael Palin, John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle, Graham Chapman, Terry Jones
Jonathan Rutlidge, Graham Chapman, Terry Jones, William Hymen, Michael Palin, John Cleese
Michael Palin, John Cleese, William Hymen, Eric Idle, Jonathan Rutlidge, Harry Shearer
John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Terry Jones, Eric Idle, William Hymen, Jonathan Rutlidge

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Palin, John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle, Graham Chapman, Terry Jones

quizzes.title: Science Quiz: Movie and Robinsons
quizzes.description: Test your science knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Science, judge, robinsons. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Why did Lewis have to keep a hat on at all times in the movie Meet the Robinsons?

options.text: It was the only thing he had from his mother
So the Robinsons wouldnt see his hair
Thats just the way the character was created

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: So the Robinsons wouldnt see his hair

questions.question: Lucille, the slightly psychotic science fair judge from the movie Meet the Robinsons, had invented a caffeine path that equaled how many cups of coffee each?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 12

questions.question: What 1995 movie was awarded with the Oscar for Best Picture at the 68th Academy Awards ceremony in 1996?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Braveheart

questions.question: In the animated family movie Meet the Robinsons, what color were the gym teachers shorts?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: green

questions.question: In the movie Meet the Robinsons, what was the reasoning that the gym teacher had given for his being allowed to judge the science fair?

options.text: He was forced to by the administration.
He fell in love with a student and needed to be near her.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It was his gym.

questions.question: What 1999 movie received the Academy Award for Best Picture at the 72nd Academy Awards ceremony in 2000?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: American Beauty

questions.question: Who directed the 2007 animated movie Meet the Robinsons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stephen J. Anderson

questions.question: What made James Cameron start working on the 1997 movie masterpiece Titanic?

options.text: He had a nightmare about the sinking of Titanic.
He wanted to make a movie which would star Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet.
He was greatly interested in shipwrecks.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was greatly interested in shipwrecks.

questions.question: At the 71st Academy Awards in 1999, this 1998 film received the Academy Award for Best Picture.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shakespeare in Love

questions.question: This 1997 movie received the Oscar for Best Picture at the 70th Academy Awards ceremony in 1998.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Titanic

questions.question: What 1996 movie won the Academy Award for Best Picture at the 69th Academy Awards in 1997?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The English Patient

questions.question: Who provided the voice for Lewis in the movie Meet the Robinsons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Both of these

questions.question: In 1995, this 1994 movie won the Oscar for Best Picture at the 67the Academy Awards ceremony.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Forrest Gump

questions.question: The dinosaur in the movie Meet the Robinsons said this famous line: I have little head and big arms.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the animated movie Meet the Robinsons, Lewis mother, when leaving him on the step, heard a noise which made her rush away. Later in the movie, we find out what caused this noise. What was it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lewis

quizzes.title: Science Quiz: James Cameron and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your science knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Science, actor, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What actor portrayed the T-1000 android in the 1991 movie Terminator 2: Judgment Day, directed by James Cameron?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert Patrick

questions.question: What was the tagline for the 1994 action comedy movie True Lies, directed by James Cameron?

options.text: He lied about lying, and then he lied again.
He was so good at lying that he got confused.
When he said I do, he never said what he did.
Dont simply hide the truth. Lie about it!

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: When he said I do, he never said what he did.

questions.question: Angelina Jolie Voight was born on June 4, 1975 in this city.

options.text: New York City, New York, USA

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Los Angeles, California, USA

questions.question: What is the meaning of the Latin proverb Quod me nutrit me destruit, one of Angelina Jolies many tattoos?

options.text: Whom I feed will destroy me
When I am naked I am vulnerable
Who feeds me will kill me

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: What nourishes me destroys me

questions.question: In August 2002 actor Jon Voight claimed this about his daughter Angelina Jolie on Access Hollywood.

options.text: He said she was having serious mental problems.
He swore he didnt want to see her children ever.
He confessed she was everything to him and wishes to have her by his side all the time.
He said no man will ever be good enough for his little girl.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He said she was having serious mental problems.

questions.question: Why did Arnold Schwarzenegger initially rejected the offer to star in the 2003 movie Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines?

options.text: Because he didnt like the script
Because he was planning to run for a Governor of California
Because James Cameron would not direct the movie
Because he had injured his back in an accident

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Because James Cameron would not direct the movie

questions.question: What title was considered for the 1991 movie Point Break, co-produced by James Cameron?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Riders on the Storm

questions.question: What was Angelina Jolie mostly teased about by her classmates when she was a student?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: How did director James Cameron get the idea for the 1989 movie The Abyss?

options.text: From a lecture in high school
From his first sea diving experience

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: From a lecture in high school

questions.question: At the age of 14, Angelina Jolie dropped out of her acting classes and started dreaming of this profession.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mortician

questions.question: What is the name of Angelina Jolies first-born biological child?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shiloh

questions.question: What type of actors did director James Cameron intend to cast for the 1986 science fiction movie Aliens?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Actors with American accents

questions.question: What actor co-wrote the 1985 movie Rambo: First Blood Part II together with James Cameron?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sylvester Stallone

questions.question: Why did director James Cameron not cast O. J. Simpson as the Terminator in the 1984 movie The Terminator?

options.text: Because he believed the character should be portrayed by a blond man
Because he thought O. J. was too nice to be cast as a killer.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Because he thought O. J. was too nice to be cast as a killer.

questions.question: Angelina Jolie co-stars with this actor in the 2001 movie Original Sin.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Antonio Banderas
